pages.text: There are many ways in which Roots can be automated.$(br2)Some devices are more suited to automation (such as the $(l:crafting/runic_crafter)runic crafter's$() auto-refilling).$(br2)As a rule, most devices that require a knife to activate can be automated with a dispenser (containing a knife) and a redstone clock.

In addition to devices, a knife in a dispenser can be used to automatically scrape moss from stone. See the $(l:automation/ritual_overgrowth)Overgrow Ritual automation$() section for more details.$(br2)Likewise, other tools can be used in dispensers, such as the $(l:automation/mortar_pestle)mortar's pestle$() and $(l:automation/runic_shears)runic shears$().

Finally, there are objects that simply provide automation by default. At the minute, this includes $(l:automation/aqueous_soil)aqueous soil$(), which automatically harvests plants upon it that grow to maturity.
